5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated that ‘Aishah said:“The Prophet (ﷺ) used to pray thirteen Rak’ah at night.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي كَمْ يُصَلِّي بِاللَّيْلِ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning how many Rak’ah should be prayed at night
